subject: New to JUnit
msgSnippet: HI! I m very new to JUnit.Should we write testcase for each and everymethod.Suppose, we have 20 methods in a particular class.Is it necessary to write all the
messageBody:
HI!

I'm very new to JUnit.Should we write testcase for each and everymethod.Suppose, we have 20 methods in a particular class.Is it necessary to write all the 20 test cases.then,it will become one small JUnit project again.

I'm giving an example here..

I have methods in my class are

1)public String getName(int num)
2)public ArrayList getArList(int num,String str)
3)public Vector getVector(int num)
4)public Hashtable getHashtable(int num)
5)public Object getObject(int num)
6)public Date getDate(int num)

i need to test all these methods,then i have to write all the testcases in a testsuit.Am i right?

Please clear my doubt.

Thanks & Regards.
Vijaya.


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
